attributes.action: Give the Local Councils the power to make companies repair the road surfaces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make All who dig up roads and footpaths to repair them so that there are no potholes and lumps in the surface, and to fine firms who don't comply with the cost of putting the repairs right. And for the councils and highways agency to pass on any claims to the company responsible where possible.
